astral_dragon.advancement.astral\/be_dra: Accept a shard of an exotic dragon's aspect into yourself, and become an Astral Dragon.
astral_dragon.advancement.astral\/dimens: Visit the Overworld, The Nether, and The End as an Astral Dragon.
astral_dragon.advancement.astral\/neutro: Reach the maximum possible growth as an Astral Dragon, and conceal the unstoppable force of a supernova within a normal-sized body.
Reach the Neutron Star classification, and start condensing your giant body into a smaller, more powerful form.
astral_dragon.advancement.astral\/reach_: Leave your time as a Protostar behind, and reach the Main Sequence classification.
astral_dragon.advancement.astral\/telepo: Instantaneous teleportation; it's easier than walking to you.
Travel vast distances in an instant.
attribute.dragonsurvival.armor_ignore_ch: The chance to ignore armor when attacking
attribute.dragonsurvival.block_break_rad: Determines the radius that you can break blocks when mining
attribute.dragonsurvival.dragon_ability_: A multiplier to the damage of dragon abilities
attribute.dragonsurvival.dragon_breath_r: Determines the range of the breath ability (the range acts in terms of blocks)
attribute.dragonsurvival.experience.desc: A multiplier to the dropped experience
attribute.dragonsurvival.flight_speed.de: A multiplier to the flight speed
Reduces the food exhaustion of flying
attribute.dragonsurvival.hunter_faction_: A multiplier to the damage the hunter faction takes from your attacks
attribute.dragonsurvival.lava_swim_speed: A multiplier to the lava swim speed
attribute.dragonsurvival.mana_regenerati: Amount of mana regenerated per tick
attribute.dragonsurvival.penalty_resista: Increases the time before the penalty effect is applied
command.dragonsurvival.growth.failed_to_: Failed to set growth since player was not a dragon.
%s was slain by %s using anti-dragon weaponry.
death.attack.dragonsurvival.ball_lightni: %s was struck by a ball of lightning.
%s was struck by a ball of lightning summoned by %s.
death.attack.dragonsurvival.burn.player: %s succumbed to searing burns whilst fighting %s.
death.attack.dragonsurvival.dragon_breat: %s succumbed to the breath weapon of a dragon.
%s succumbed to the breath weapon of %s.
death.attack.dragonsurvival.drain.player: %s had their life force drained by %s.
%s burnt to a crisp by %s's fire breath.
death.attack.dragonsurvival.forest_breat: %s was poisoned by a toxic breath.
death.attack.dragonsurvival.rain_burn.pl: %s couldn't handle a light rain whilst fighting %s.
%s was reduced to a singularity by %s
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.amphibious: ■ Sea dragons do not need to hold their §2breath underwater§r§7. In addition, they can §2swim much faster§r§7 than other dragons.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.astral_bre: §7■ Exhale a §r§bstarry flurry§r§7 of energy that wipes §r§bpositive§r§7 status effects from victims.§r
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.astral_imm: §7■ Grants immunity to astral-based dragon magic.§r
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.astral_mag:
■ Upgrading this ability increases your §2maximum mana pool§r§7 and allows to restore mana more quickly while in open air.

■ §8The more levels you have, the more mana you get automatically.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.astral_spi: ■ You can §2spin§r§7 through the §fair§r§7, boosting your speed.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.ball_light:
■ Shoot out a condensed ball of electrical energy. Deals damage and §celectrifies§r nearby enemies as it travels.

■ During a thunderstorm, lightning may strike the ball.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.burn.desc:
■ Your target has a chance to receive the §c«Burned»§r effect from your attacks.

■ The effect deals damage when the target §fmoves§r§7. The faster the movement, the §fmore damage§r§7 is done.

■ §8Creatures with fire resistance are immune to this effect.§r
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.cave_athle: ■ Standing on §fstone§7 surfaces will increase your §2movement speed§7.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.cave_claws: ■ Cave dragons can §2mine stone blocks§r§7 and various ores §fwithout tools§r§7. This ability gets stronger as you grow.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.cave_magic:
■ Upgrading this ability increases your §2maximum mana pool§r§7 and allows to restore mana by standing on §fhot blocks§r§7.

■ §8The more levels you have, the more mana you get automatically.
■ You can §2spin§r§7 through the §fair§r§7 and in §flava§r§7, boosting your speed. Head to §fthe End§r §7to learn this skill.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.cave_wings: ■ Dragons use §flevitation§r§7 to §2fly§r§7, but are rarely born with that ability.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.cliffhange: ■ Forest dragons are very §flight§r§7. Your landing becomes much §2softer§r§7.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.contrast_s:
■ You can increase your §2resistance§r§7 to §frain§r§7, §fsnow§r§7 and §fsnowfall§r§7 by upgrading this ability.

■ §8Water, potions and snowballs are still dangerous.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.diver.desc: ■ Sea dragons' natural dexterity in water allows them to §2mine resources underwater§r§7 without a speed penalty.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.electric_i: ■ Sea dragons have an innate §2immunity to lightning§r§7.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.energy_sip: ■ Expend mana to more quickly drain the area and §6regain energy§r.
■ Shoots out a fireball that §cexplodes§r and sets the area on §cfire§r.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.fire_immun: ■ Cave dragons have innate §2immunity to fire§r. They feel at home in The Nether.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.forest_ath: ■ Standing on §fgrassy§r§7 or §fwooden§r§7 surfaces will increase your §2movement speed§r§7.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.forest_bre:
■ Breathe out toxic gas that causes §c«Drain»§r, which withers away enemies over time.

■ §fRange§r§7 depends on age of the dragon.

■ §8Cannot be used while affected by «Stress».§r
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.forest_cla: ■ Forest dragons can §2chop§7 trees faster §fwithout tools§r§7. This ability gets stronger as you grow.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.forest_imm: ■ The skin of forest dragons is covered with §ffoliage§r§7 that give you §2immunity to thorn bushes and cacti§r§7.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.forest_mag:
■ Upgrading this ability increases your §2maximum mana pool§r§7 and allows to restore mana by standing on §fgrass§r§7 or under direct §fsunlight§r§7.

■ §8The more levels you have, the more mana you get automatically.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.forest_spi: ■ You can §2spin§r§7 through the §fair§r§7 and in §fwater§r§7, boosting your speed. Head to §fthe End§r §7to learn this skill.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.forest_win: ■ Dragons use §flevitation§r§7 to §2fly§r§7, but are rarely born with that ability.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.friendly_f:
■ Coat your allies with §fprotective dust§r§7 and they get the §2Fire Resistance§r§7 effect.

■ Your pets will stop dying by your §ffire§r§7 and your friends will be able to bathe in §flava§r§7. For a while.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.furnace_he:
■ §2Melts items§r§7 on the ground.

■ The melting rate is §ffaster§r§7 when there are fewer items in the stack. Items §fretain§r§7 their melting degree for a short duration if you stop casting, but §fpicking up§r§7 the item will discard all progress.

■ Inflicts §clittle damage§r§7 compared to Nether Breath.

■ §8Cannot be used under water, and during rain.§r
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.hunter.des:
■ Cover yourself and allies in a thick carpet of herbs. This grants §ffast§r§7 movement and §2Invisibility§r§7 whilst in the grass.

■ Your first attack while invisible is a critical hit with a §c%-based damage§r§7 bonus.

■ §8Effect does not stack. Will be removed early if you take damage, or attack a target.§r
■ Increases your §2capacity for hydration§r§7 while outside of water. Will help you to survive while venturing onto land, or even in the §fNether§r§7.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.inspiratio: ■ Provides §2Haste§r to you and all nearby creatures. Increasing block §fharvesting speed§r§7.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.lava_swimm: ■ Cave dragons can §2swim in lava§r§7, but they can't stay here too long because the §ftemperature§r§7 is too high.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.light_in_d: ■ Allows you to §2stay longer§r§7 in §fdark§r§7 areas.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.manifold_t: ■ The dimensions within your talons gain another layer of temporal folding, adding magic damage to all your melee strikes. You also steal time from struck enemies, briefly giving you increased movement and attack speed.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.nether_bre:
■ The stream of fire that §cignites§r§7 enemies, items and blocks. Is able to §cdestroy§r§7 some blocks.

■ §fRange§r§7 depends on age of the dragon.

■ §8Cannot be used under water, and during rain.§r
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.ore_glow.d: ■ Gives you and the players around you the ability to §2illuminate ore§r§7.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.passive_re: §7■ Passively extract excess §r§6thermal and kinetic energy§r§7 from the surrounding area to §r§2replenish your food supply§r§7.§r
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.sea_athlet: ■ Standing on wet, sandy and icy surfaces increases §2running speed§r§7.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.sea_claws_: ■ Sea dragons can dig blocks that require shovels §2without tools§r§7. This ability gets stronger as you grow.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.sea_eyes.d: ■ Give yourself §2Sea Vision§r§7 for a short time. Makes water more clear and less dark.
■ Upgrading this ability increases your §2maximum mana pool§r§7 and allows to restore mana by standing on §fwet blocks§r§7.

■ §8The more levels you have, the more mana you get automatically.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.sea_spin.d: ■ You can §2spin§r§7 through the §fair§r§7 and in §fwater§r§7, boosting your speed. Head to §2the End§r §7to learn this skill.
■ Dragons use §2levitation§r to fly, but are rarely born with that ability.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.singularit: ■ Release a lesser singularity that pulls nearby entities in.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.soul_revel: ■ Give a buff to yourself and your allies that multiplies the amount of §2experience§r gained from monsters.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.spectral_i: ■ Gives a chance to make your attack §cignore enemy armor§r§7.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.spike.desc:
■ Shoot out sharp §cdarts§r, which fly a large distance to pierce your target.

■ §8Less effective underwater.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.storm_brea:
■ Breathe out a stream of sparks and electricity. Targets become §c«Electrified»§r and deal electric damage to everything nearby.

■ §fCharges creepers§r§7, and may summon §fthunderbolts§r§7 during a storm.

■ §fRange§r§8 depends on the age of the dragon.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.sturdy_ski: ■ Gives you and your allies additional §2armor points§r§7.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.sun_breath:
■ Breathe out solar energy stored within you, helping §2plants grow faster§r§7. Turns §fdirt§r§7 into other blocks with a small chance. It also §fpoisons§r§7 potatoes.

■ §fRange§r§7 depends on age of the dragon.

■ §8Cannot be used while affected by «Stress».§r
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.wyrmhole.d: §7■ §5Warp§r§7 space-time to move §r§2yourself§r§7 and §r§3nearby entities§r§7 vast distances in the blink of an eye.§r
dragon_body.dragonsurvival.center.desc:
§6■ Central Type§r
■ Inhabitants of all biomes, and the most common type of dragon. They are the most balanced type of dragon, having no particular strengths or weaknesses.
dragon_body.dragonsurvival.east.desc:
§6■ Eastern Type§r
■ Adapted to life in caves, they lack large wings, reducing the effectiveness of their levitation magic, but they are still excellent swimmers. They have a larger supply of mana, and natural armor.
dragon_body.dragonsurvival.north.desc:
§6■ Northern Type§r
■ Perfect travelers, conquering water, lava and air. They are slower on the ground and weaker physically, but are magically adept and excel at swimming. Their flat bodies allow them to go places other dragons cannot.
dragon_body.dragonsurvival.south.desc:
§6■ Southern Type§r
■ They are adapted to life on the plains, capable of running swiftly, and leaping high into the air. The special structure of their paws gives them many advantages on the ground, and they are physically strong, but they will struggle at flight and swimming.
dragon_body.dragonsurvival.west.desc:
§6■ Western Type§r
■ Conquerors of mountain and sky, they are unrivalled in their element, but are rather clumsy on the ground.
dragon_penalty.dragonsurvival.cold_weakn:
■ Cave dragons slowly take §cdamage§r while in snow or rain due to their fiery nature.

■ The skill §2«Contrast Shower»§r §7could make your life easier.
dragon_penalty.dragonsurvival.fear.desc:
■ Dragons are §dscary§r§7  creatures. Animals will try to §cavoid§r them.

■ Build the §2«Beacon»§7 to become more attractive.
dragon_penalty.dragonsurvival.fear_of_da:
■ The predatory plants in your body dislike §dDarkness§r. If the light level around you is lower than 4, you may receive the §c«Stress»§r effect, rapidly draining your food gauge.

■ The skill §2«Light the Dark» §7and effect §2«Forest Magic» §7could make your life easier.
dragon_penalty.dragonsurvival.gravity_we: §bAstral dragons§r do poorly when trapped deep in a dimension's gravity well, suffering from occasional §cslowdown§r effects and an inability to §6recover energy§r.
dragon_penalty.dragonsurvival.inediate.d: §bAstral dragons §r§4do not eat§r§7 food, preferring instead to §r§6siphon energy§r§7 from the surrounding air.  You §r§4cannot§r§7 regain energy while inside fluids.§r
dragon_penalty.dragonsurvival.item_black: ■ Dragons are §dunable to wield§r§7 or equip certain items. Such as bows, shields, and tridents. They won't equip and will §cdrop§r from the hotbar, but you can still craft items with it.
■ If sea dragon are outside of the water for too long, they will §ddehydrate§r§7 and suffer §ddamage§r§7.

■ Being in rain, ice or snow or drinking water bottles rehydrates you. The skill §2«Hydration Capacity»§r §7could make your life easier.
dragon_penalty.dragonsurvival.water_weak:
■ Cave dragons quickly take §cdamage§r from water. Explosive water potions and snowballs also deal damage.

■ The effect §2«Cave Fire»§r §7could make your life easier.
dragon_species.dragonsurvival.astral_dra:
§7■ §bAstral Dragons§r§7 are a unique species that §r§ado not eat§r§7, instead gaining their energy by draining excess from the air around them.

§2■ Features:§r§7 Energy regeneration, purifying magic.
§4■ Weaknesses:§r Deep gravity wells, liquids
§6■ Diet: §r %s

§7■ You are an §bAstral Dragon§r§7, making you §r§3inediate§r§7.  You grow §r§1more slowly§r§7 than other dragons.  You will eventually condense into a smaller form after you reach your maximum size.  You §r§4cannot§r§7 regain energy within liquids or while deep underground.
You must have traversed a portal to reach The End in order to become this species.
dragon_species.dragonsurvival.cave_drago:
§7■ §6Cave Dragons§r§7 are the spawn of §ffire§r§7. They have little in common with living creatures. Their skeleton is made of §fnetherite§r§7, blood is §flava§r§7, and skin is §frocks§r§7.

§2■ Features:§f§r§7 fire resistance, pickaxe claws, lava magic, faster movement on stone and hot blocks.
§4■ Weakness:§r water.
§6■ Diet:§r %s

§7■ §6Cave Dragon§r§7 are the spawn of §ffire§r§7. You have little in common with living creatures. Your skeleton is made of §fnetherite§r§7, your blood is §flava§r§7, and your skin is §frocks§r§7.

§7■ To “live” you must §ffeed§r§7 on energy to keep you warm. §cWater§r§7 as a chemical element is not compatible with you.
dragon_species.dragonsurvival.forest_dra:
§7■ §6Forest Dragons§r§7 is a §fdiamond§r§7 elementals covered in a multitude of §fplants§r§7. They are excellent §fhunters§r§7 and §ffarmers§r§7.

§2■ Features:§f§r§7 soft fall, axe claws, drain and growth magic, faster movement on wooden and grass blocks.
§4■ Weakness:§r§7 dark caves.
§6■ Diet:§r %s

§7■ §6Forest Dragon§r§7 is a §fdiamond§r§7 elemental covered in a multitude of §fplants§r§7. You are excellent §fhunter§r§7 and §ffarmer§r§7.

§7■ §fRaw meat§r§7, §fpoisonous potatoes§r§7, and certain types of §fthorny shrubs§r§7 are your favorite foods and fertilizer for your plants that hate the §cdarkness§r§7 of caves.
dragon_species.dragonsurvival.sea_dragon:
§7■ §6Sea Dragons§r§7 are fragile but ferocious §fcreatures§r§7. Their skeletons are made of §fgold§r§7 and conducts §felectricity§r§7 well.

§2■ Features:§f§r§7 underwater breathing, shovel claws, electric magic, faster movement on wet and beach blocks.
§4■ Weakness:§r§7 dehydration.
§6■ Diet:§r %s

§7■ §6Sea Dragons§r§7 are fragile but ferocious §fcreatures§r§7. Their skeletons are made of §fgold§r§7 and conducts §felectricity§r§7 well.

§7■ You have ideally mastered §faquaculture§r§7 and love §fseafood§r§7. You would live forever in the §fwater§r§7, but for the sake of resources you have to leave this cozy world and be exposed to §cdryness§r§7.
dragonsurvival.advancement.be_adult_drag: Grow your dragon into an adult! Time to look for a player-rider.
dragonsurvival.advancement.be_dragon.des: Unless you can be a dragon.
dragonsurvival.advancement.be_young_drag: Become a young dragon using time or heart parts.
dragonsurvival.advancement.cave\/be_old_: Gain level 60 growth as a cave dragon.
dragonsurvival.advancement.cave\/diamond: Find the diamonds at the bottom of the lava lake and dig them out.
dragonsurvival.advancement.cave\/go_home: Submerge yourself in the fiery depths of the nether.
dragonsurvival.advancement.cave\/master_: Achieve total mastery of your cave dragon passive skills.
dragonsurvival.advancement.cave\/rock_ea: Eat all unique cave dragon foods from Dragon Survival. You can check what foods you can eat in the dragon altar. Don't forget to try the hot dragon rod!
dragonsurvival.advancement.cave\/swim_in: Swim in a deep pool of lava as cave dragon!
dragonsurvival.advancement.cave\/water_s: Get the water resistance effect from food or beacon and swim in the water.
dragonsurvival.advancement.change_beacon: Upgrade the Empty Dragon Beacon with special item.
Collect elder dragon dust by mining ore.
dragonsurvival.advancement.collect_heart: Get the Elder Dragon Heart by killing a monster with more than 50 health.
dragonsurvival.advancement.dark\/affecte: After a lot of killing, the dragon hunters are interested in you.
dragonsurvival.advancement.dark\/collect: Tear a Dark Key from a hunter knight. Blood will have to be spilled.
dragonsurvival.advancement.dark\/get_arm: Upgrade a piece of Netherite armor to Dark Dragon Armor.
Put together a full set of Dark Dragon Armor, and continue your path to total conquest.
dragonsurvival.advancement.dark\/open_va: Follow a Dark Key to a Dark Vault, and claim your murderous prize.
dragonsurvival.advancement.dark\/steal_f: Put your infamy to use by demanding tribute from the Villagers.
dragonsurvival.advancement.find_bones.de: Find the burial place of the Elder Dragon's children.
dragonsurvival.advancement.find_end_plat: Venture forth into The End as a dragon
dragonsurvival.advancement.find_end_stru: Find a special structure in The End to get the Dragon Soul or Spin ability.
dragonsurvival.advancement.find_nether_s: Find any dragon statue in The Nether.
dragonsurvival.advancement.find_overworl: Find any dragon statue in The Overworld.
dragonsurvival.advancement.forest\/be_dr: Become a forest dragon by any means necessary.
dragonsurvival.advancement.forest\/be_ol: Gain level 60 growth as a forest dragon.
dragonsurvival.advancement.forest\/maste: Achieve total mastery of your forest dragon passive skills.
dragonsurvival.advancement.forest\/meat_: Eat all unique forest dragon foods from Dragon Survival. You can check what foods you can eat in the dragon altar.
dragonsurvival.advancement.forest\/poiso: Use the forest dragon breath to get more poisoned potatoes from the crop fields.
dragonsurvival.advancement.forest\/preve: Venture into the darkness, unafraid of what may happen.
dragonsurvival.advancement.forest\/stand: Jump into sweet berry bushes and test the strength of your skin!
dragonsurvival.advancement.forest\/trans: Transplant a tasty purple flower back home on the Overworld.
dragonsurvival.advancement.get_all_beaco: Buy all 3 effects from all Dragon Beacon's.
dragonsurvival.advancement.hunter\/colle: Earn a Hunter Key by cooperating with the Dragon Hunters.
dragonsurvival.advancement.hunter\/fire_: Fire a crossbow with the bolas enchantment. Time to catch dragons!
dragonsurvival.advancement.hunter\/open_: Follow a Hunter Key to the secret stash and liberate a Dragon Hunter Vault of its contents.
dragonsurvival.advancement.hunter\/promo: Find Spearman and make him an offer he can't refuse!
dragonsurvival.advancement.light\/collec: Earn a Light Key by trading with the Dragon Rider villagers.
dragonsurvival.advancement.light\/dragon: Create a Rider Workbench to create the new villager profession.
dragonsurvival.advancement.light\/get_ar: Upgrade a piece of Netherite armor to Light Dragon Armor.
Put together a full set of Light Dragon Armor, and stand defiant against all who would bring you harm.
dragonsurvival.advancement.light\/open_v: Find a Light Vault, and open it using a Light Key.
dragonsurvival.advancement.path_choice.d: Find a villager and decide their fate.
dragonsurvival.advancement.place_altar.d: Place a Dragon Altar to change the species or appearance of a dragon.
dragonsurvival.advancement.sea\/be_drago: Become a sea dragon by any means necessary.
dragonsurvival.advancement.sea\/be_old_d: Gain level 60 growth as a sea dragon.
dragonsurvival.advancement.sea\/fish_eat: Eat all unique sea dragon foods from Dragon Survival. You can check what foods you can eat in the dragon altar.
dragonsurvival.advancement.sea\/loot_shi: Discover and claim the loot of unfortunate shipwrecks.
dragonsurvival.advancement.sea\/master_a: Achieve total mastery of your sea dragon passive skills.
dragonsurvival.advancement.sea\/peace_in: Use a Sea Beacon's magic to enter The Nether without drying out.
dragonsurvival.advancement.sea\/place_sn: Place some snow to stay hydrated in the Nether.
dragonsurvival.advancement.sea\/rain_dan: Feel hydration during rain and thunderstorm.
dragonsurvival.advancement.sleep_on_hoar: Collect yourself a truly large stash of treasure. 100 blocks will be enough.
dragonsurvival.advancement.sleep_on_mass: Build yourself a hoard of 240 treasure blocks and experience regeneration while you sleep!
dragonsurvival.advancement.sleep_on_trea: Sleep on a pile of 10 or more treasure blocks.
dragonsurvival.advancement.stop_natural_: Stop your natural growth by using a specific growth item.
dragonsurvival.advancement.use_dragon_so: Use a Dragon Soul to store all your stats. You can pass it on to another player or keep it for yourself!
dragonsurvival.advancement.use_memory_bl: Place any Dragon Beacon on top of the Memory Block.
dragonsurvival.configuration.ability_eff:
Bypasses the set display type in case certain effects should be always visible (namespace:path)
The id to be specified here can be seen when hovering the effect with advanced tooltips enabled
Determines how (or whether) ability effects should be displayed
dragonsurvival.configuration.allow_drago: If enabled players that have not yet chosen a dragon species will be able to do so from the vanilla inventory
dragonsurvival.configuration.altar_coold: Cooldown (in seconds) after using an altar
dragonsurvival.configuration.alternate_c:
If enabled abilities will be cast by pressing their respective keybinds
If disabled the global casting keybind will be used
dragonsurvival.configuration.ambusher_ar: Base value for the armor attribute
Base value for the armor toughness attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.ambusher_at: Base value for the attack damage attribute
Determines the crossbow attack rate (in ticks) (20 ticks = 1 second) of the ambusher
Base value for the attack knockback attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.ambusher_he: Base value for the max health attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.ambusher_kn: Base value for the knockback resistance attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.ambusher_mo: Base value for the movement speed attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.ambusher_sp: Determines the amount of time (in ticks) (20 ticks = 1 second) that needs to pass before another ambusher spawn attempt is made
dragonsurvival.configuration.amusher_spa:
Determines the chance (in %) of an ambusher spawning
The spawn frequency will reset even if no actual spawn occurs due to this chance not being met
dragonsurvival.configuration.anchor_has_: If enabled, the primordial anchor will become unusuable as long as the ender dragon is dead.
dragonsurvival.configuration.backpack_sl: The curios slot which may contain the backpack (if Curios is installed)
dragonsurvival.configuration.bad_food_po: Chance of getting poisoned from eating non-dragon food
dragonsurvival.configuration.base_dragon: Base offset for the dragon's third person camera (is multiplied and scaled by the other factors)
dragonsurvival.configuration.blast_dust_: A multiplier to the amplifier which determines the explosion radius of the blast dust effect
dragonsurvival.configuration.block_destr:
Determines the percentage chance that a block is removed, bypassing sound or particle effects
This is to avoid potential lag issues due to large amounts of sound effects or particles
dragonsurvival.configuration.cast_bar_x_: Offset for the x position of the cast bar
dragonsurvival.configuration.cast_bar_y_: Offset for the y position of the cast bar
dragonsurvival.configuration.charged_eff: Determines the damage dealt by the charged effect
Determines the max. amount of times the charged effect can chain. Set to -1 for infinite chaining
Amount of entities the charged effect can chain to at once
Determines the radius of the charged effect spread
dragonsurvival.configuration.collision_d: How much does the change in horizontal speed impact the damage taken from a collision whilst flying?
The amount of damage subtracted from the base damage when a collision occurs whilst flying.
dragonsurvival.configuration.crushing_in: The amount of ticks (20 ticks = 1 second) before an entity can be crushed again
dragonsurvival.configuration.crushing_si: The size ratio between the entity and the crusher for crushing to occur
dragonsurvival.configuration.damage_on_w: Damage On Wrong Source Of Magic
Source of magic that does not match the dragon species will damage the player if enabled
dragonsurvival.configuration.disable_dra: If enabled dragons will not take suffocation damage
dragonsurvival.configuration.disable_siz: Disable all size-based camera modifications from DS
dragonsurvival.configuration.dragon_came: The scale at which the dragon's third person camera will stop zooming in
How much scale impacts the third person camera distance
dragonsurvival.configuration.dragon_food: Dragons will need to adhere to their diets if enabled
dragonsurvival.configuration.dragon_hear: Determines the chance (in %) of dragon heart shards dropping from entities with a maximum health between 14 and 20
Should the entity type tag 'drops_dragon_heart_shard' be treated as a whitelist instead of a blacklist?
dragonsurvival.configuration.dragon_inve: If enabled the default inventory is replaced with a custom inventory
dragonsurvival.configuration.dragon_name: If enabled name tags will be shown for dragons
dragonsurvival.configuration.dragon_ore_: Determines the chance (in %) of bones dropping when a dragon harvests an ore block
Determines the chance (in %) of dust dropping when a dragon harvests an ore block
dragonsurvival.configuration.dragon_soul: Cooldown (in ticks) (20 ticks = 1 second) that occurs after using the dragon soul
dragonsurvival.configuration.drain_effec: Determines the damage dealt by the drain effect
dragonsurvival.configuration.effects_on_:
Effects that are granted when skipping a night when sleeping on treasures
Format: resource/tag;duration;amplifier;duration_multiplier;amplifier_multiplier
The resource can also be defined using regular expressions (for both namespace and path)
the multipliers are applied per nearby treasure ('max_treasure_for_rate_reduction' is used as limit)
(amplifier is calculated with +1, the +1 is subtracted for the final result)
dragonsurvival.configuration.elder_drago: Determines the chance (in %) of elder dragon hearts dropping from entities with a maximum health above 50
Should the entity type tag 'drops_elder_dragon_heart' be treated as a whitelist instead of a blacklist?
dragonsurvival.configuration.enable_coll: Dragons will take damage from colliding whilst glide-flying (similar to elytra).
dragonsurvival.configuration.enable_flig: Dragons will take fall damage from colliding whilst glide-flying (similar to elytra).
dragonsurvival.configuration.enchantment: Adds enchantment descriptions to enchanted books which contain 1 enchantment (and said enchantment is from this mod)
dragonsurvival.configuration.ender_drago: If enabled, the ender dragon will curse you with an effect that prevents you from using some of your abilities when killed.
dragonsurvival.configuration.flat_dragon: Flat offset for the dragon's third person camera (is added after all other factors are combined)
dragonsurvival.configuration.flight_came: Enable / Disable camera movement while gliding as a dragon
dragonsurvival.configuration.flight_hung: Determines the required food values to be able to fly
Determines the amount of ticks (20 ticks = 1 second) it takes for one hunger point to be drained while flying
dragonsurvival.configuration.flight_spin: Cooldown (in seconds) of the spin attack during flight
dragonsurvival.configuration.flight_zoom: Enable / Disable a zoom effect while gliding as a dragon
dragonsurvival.configuration.fold_wings_: If enabled dragons will automatically stop fold their wings (i.e. stop flying) when landing
Determines the food values at which the dragon will stop being able to fly mid-flight
dragonsurvival.configuration.food_toolti:
Determines how dragon food tooltip is handled
none: no food tooltip / default: always show current and others when shift is pressed / only_current: never show others / all_shift: show current and others only when shift is pressed
dragonsurvival.configuration.force_vault: If enabled vaults will immediately update their state
dragonsurvival.configuration.griffin_arm: Base value for the armor attribute
Base value for the armor toughness attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.griffin_att: Base value for the attack damage attribute
Base value for the attack knockback attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.griffin_fly: Base value for the flying speed attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.griffin_hea: Base value for the max health attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.griffin_kno: Base value for the knockback resistance attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.griffin_mov: Base value for the movement speed attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.griffin_ran: Determines the attack radius of the griffin
dragonsurvival.configuration.growth_x_of: Offset for the x position of the item growth icon
dragonsurvival.configuration.growth_y_of: Offset for the y position of the item growth icon
dragonsurvival.configuration.hound_armor: Base value for the armor attribute
Base value for the armor toughness attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.hound_attac: Base value for the attack damage attribute
Base value for the attack knockback attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.hound_healt: Base value for the max health attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.hound_knock: Base value for the knockback resistance attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.hound_movem: Base value for the movement speed attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.hound_reinf: Determines how many hounds reinforce the ambusher when he is attacked
dragonsurvival.configuration.hound_slowd: Determines the chance (in %) of the knight hound applying the slowness effect when they attack
dragonsurvival.configuration.human_ore_b: Determines the chance (in %) of bones dropping when a human harvests an ore block
dragonsurvival.configuration.human_ore_d: Determines the chance (in %) of dust dropping when a human harvests an ore block
dragonsurvival.configuration.hunter_dama:
Determines the damage bonus (0.5 -> 50%) per level of the effect
The damage bonus scales with the current stacks, max. amount being reached at max. stacks
dragonsurvival.configuration.hunter_fix_: This enables the shader features of fabulous mode which are needed for translucency to work correctly
dragonsurvival.configuration.hunter_full: If enabled other players will be fully invisible at maximum hunter stacks
dragonsurvival.configuration.hunter_max_: The current level compared to the maximum level determines how quickly stacks are gained or lost
dragonsurvival.configuration.hunter_tran: Hunter Translucent Items In First Person
If enabled items held in first person will also appear translucent
dragonsurvival.configuration.inventory_t: If enabled there will be a button that lets you switch between the custom and vanilla inventory
dragonsurvival.configuration.jump_to_fly: If enabled flight will be activated when jumping in the air
dragonsurvival.configuration.knight_armo: Base value for the armor attribute
Base value for the armor toughness attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.knight_atta: Base value for the attack damage attribute
Base value for the attack knockback attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.knight_heal: Base value for the max health attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.knight_knoc: Base value for the knockback resistance attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.knight_move: Base value for the movement speed attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.knight_shie: Determines the chance (in %) of knights having a shield
dragonsurvival.configuration.large_size_: The factor by which the reduced additional animation speed from being bigger is multiplied. 1.0 represents the speed accurately reflecting the size of the dragon.
dragonsurvival.configuration.leader_armo: Base value for the armor attribute
Base value for the armor toughness attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.leader_heal: Base value for the max health attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.leader_knoc: Base value for the knockback resistance attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.leader_move: Base value for the movement speed attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.limited_rid: If enabled dragons will be limited to riding the entities in the entity tag 'dragonsurvival:vehicle_whitelist'
dragonsurvival.configuration.look_at_sky: If enabled together with [jump_to_fly] you will be required to look at the sky to start flying
dragonsurvival.configuration.mana_bar_x_: Offset for the x position of the mana bar
dragonsurvival.configuration.mana_bar_y_: Offset for the y position of the mana bar
dragonsurvival.configuration.mark_disabl: How long until the red overlay activates if an ability is disabled.
Mark Disabled Abilities Red Lerp Speed
How fast the lerp speed is for marking disabled abilities red.
dragonsurvival.configuration.max_animati: The maximum animation speed allowed for dragons.
The maximum value that the speed factor can add to the base animation speed.
dragonsurvival.configuration.max_pillage: Max. distance the pillage icon will be rendered at (0 means it will be disabled)
dragonsurvival.configuration.max_treasur:
The maximum amount of additional treasure that can affect the health regeneration reduction
Only treasures within a 16 x 9 x 16 radius are considered
dragonsurvival.configuration.min_animati: The minimum animation speed allowed for dragons.
dragonsurvival.configuration.min_near_pl:
Lower values prevent x-ray through blocks when using a small entity scale
A value that is too low may cause issues when rendering chunks when certain (unknown) mods are present
dragonsurvival.configuration.movement_an: The amount by which the movement animation speed factor is multiplied. 1.0 represents the animation speed accurately reflecting the speed of your movement.
dragonsurvival.configuration.nearby_trea:
The amount of ticks (20 ticks = 1 second) each nearby treasure reduces the health regeneration time by
(i.e. it increases the rate of regeneration)
dragonsurvival.configuration.no_humans_a: If enabled, players will start as a dragon and will never be allowed to be a human.
dragonsurvival.configuration.no_speed_re: No Speed Requirement For Vertical Acceleration
Dragons always accelerate vertically when flying, even when they aren't moving fast enough.
dragonsurvival.configuration.pillage_coo: Cooldown in ticks (20 ticks = 1 second) before the entity can be pillaged again
dragonsurvival.configuration.pillager_ex: How many experience points are gained when stealing from villagers
dragonsurvival.configuration.player_targ:
Determines how players are handled for the initial targeting of abilities
The flags can be combined, e.g. '3' combines the flags '1' and '2'
0: No special handling (players are allies on the same team, otherwise they count as 'neutral')
1: They are always considered as 'ally'
2: They are always considered as 'enemy' (unless they're on the same team without friendly fire enabled)
4: Enabled Friendly fire on a team no longer flags players as 'enemy'
dragonsurvival.configuration.primordial_: Primordial Anchor Gives Flight Grant State
If enabled, the primordial anchor will give the flight grant state.
Primordial Anchor Gives Spin Grant State
If enabled, the primordial anchor will give the spin grant state.
dragonsurvival.configuration.render_cust: If enabled your custom dragon skin will be rendered
dragonsurvival.configuration.render_drag: If enabled dragon claws and teeth will have an overlay depending on the items in the claw slots
If enabled the dragon body will be visible in first person
dragonsurvival.configuration.render_firs: If enabled the dragon body will be visible in first person while flying
dragonsurvival.configuration.render_held: If enabled items will be rendered for dragons while in third person mode
dragonsurvival.configuration.render_item:
If enabled held items will be rendered neat the mouth of the dragon
If disabled held items will be displayed on the side of the dragon
dragonsurvival.configuration.render_othe: If enabled custom skins of other players will be rendered
dragonsurvival.configuration.require_exp: Require Experience Drop For Dragon Ore
Require the ore to drop experience for it to drop dragon ore items
dragonsurvival.configuration.retain_claw: If enabled the items in the claw inventory will not drop on death
dragonsurvival.configuration.riding_offs:
Offset the riding position per entity type
Format: resource/tag;x_offset;y_offset;z_offset
The resource can also be defined using regular expressions (for both namespace and path)
dragonsurvival.configuration.save_all_ab:
If enabled all abilities will remain when changing dragon species
This does not mean that the other dragon species gains these abilities
It means that when turning to the previous type the abilities will have the same levels
dragonsurvival.configuration.save_growth: If enabled the current growth will be saved for the current dragon species when changing types or reverting back to being a human
dragonsurvival.configuration.show_vanill: If enabled the vanilla experience bar will be shown
If enabled the vanilla food bar will be shown
dragonsurvival.configuration.skill_bar_x: Offset for the x position of the skill bar
dragonsurvival.configuration.skill_bar_y: Offset for the x position of the skill bar
dragonsurvival.configuration.small_size_: The factor by which the additional animation speed from being smaller is multiplied. 1.0 represents the speed accurately reflecting the size of the dragon.
dragonsurvival.configuration.source_of_m: Max. duration (in ticks) (20 ticks = 1 second) the source of magic effect can stack up to
dragonsurvival.configuration.spearman_ar: Base value for the armor attribute
Base value for the armor toughness attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.spearman_at: Base value for the attack damage attribute
Base value for the attack knockback attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.spearman_bo: Additional horizontal reach for the spearman
Additional vertical reach for the spearman
dragonsurvival.configuration.spearman_he: Base value for the max health attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.spearman_kn: Base value for the knockback resistance attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.spearman_mo: Base value for the movement speed attribute
dragonsurvival.configuration.spearman_re: Determines how many spearman reinforce the ambusher when he is attacked
dragonsurvival.configuration.spin_cooldo: Offset to the x position of the spin cooldown indicator
Offset to the y position of the spin cooldown indicator
dragonsurvival.configuration.stable_hove: If enabled hovering will behave the same as creative flight (i.e. stable flight)
dragonsurvival.configuration.stable_nigh: If enabled night vision will no longer flicker when on a low duration
dragonsurvival.configuration.start_with_: If enabled players will be given a choice to select a dragon species when first joining the world
dragonsurvival.configuration.stress_exha: The amount of exhaustion applied every 20 ticks while stressed. Each amplifier level cuts the delay in half.
dragonsurvival.configuration.sync_claw_r:
If enabled dragon claw and teeth (which indicate the currently equipped claw tools) will be synchronized to other players
This may be relevant for any sort of PvP content
dragonsurvival.configuration.tooltip_cha: If enabled certain modifications to some tooltips will be made (e.g. dragon food items)
dragonsurvival.configuration.transform_a: Enables the transformation of certain blocks into dragon altars when using an elder dragon bone item on them
dragonsurvival.configuration.trapped_eff: Determines how long (in seconds) the trapped effect lasts
dragonsurvival.configuration.treasure_he: Sleeping on treasure blocks will regenerate health if enabled
The time in ticks (20 ticks = 1 second) it takes to recover 1 health while sleeping on treasure
dragonsurvival.configuration.weak_dragon: Determines the chance (in %) of weak dragon hearts dropping from entities with a maximum health between 20 and 50
Should the entity type tag 'drops_weak_dragon_heart' be treated as a whitelist instead of a blacklist?
dragonsurvival.description.addition.blac: ■§7 You should have used the Eye of Innos.
dragonsurvival.description.addition.cave: ■§7 A large door that only a cave dragon may open.
■§7 Produces a redstone signal while a cave dragon stands on it. Can open a cave dragon door, if adjacent to it.
■§7 Cave dragons can bathe here to temporarily gain infinite mana. Damages other creatures.
dragonsurvival.description.addition.drag: ■§7 Can be activated by dragons to grant special effects.

■§7 If set under any dragon beacon, you will passively receive its effect in an area centered on the beacon at no additional cost, but for reduced duration. You may still activate the beacon to receive the full duration effect.
■§7 Produces a redstone signal while any dragon stands on it. It will not activate if a human steps on it.
dragonsurvival.description.addition.fore: ■§7 A large door that only a forest dragon may open.
■§7 Produces a redstone signal while a forest dragon stands on it. Can open a forest dragon door, if adjacent to it.
■§7 Forest dragons can bathe here to temporarily gain infinite mana. Damages other creatures.
dragonsurvival.description.addition.gold: ■§7 You surely remember that the knight wore dark armor. Where did the golden helmet come from?
dragonsurvival.description.addition.gray: ■§7 Poor hunter. Fortunately, you didn't know him.
dragonsurvival.description.addition.huma: ■§7 Produces a redstone signal only while a human stands on it. Will not activate for dragons.
dragonsurvival.description.addition.lega: ■§7 The very first large door we added to the mod. Just for nostalgia.
dragonsurvival.description.addition.sea_: ■§7 A large door that only a sea dragon may open.
■§7 Produces a redstone signal while a sea dragon stands on it. Can open a sea dragon door, if adjacent to it.
■§7 Sea dragons can bathe here to temporarily gain infinite mana. Damages other creatures.
dragonsurvival.description.beacon_activa: ■§7 By combining the basic elements of dragons, you have the item to activate the beacon. Depending what species of dragon you are, the beacon will have different effects.
dragonsurvival.description.charged_soup: ■§7 A concoction of various cave dragon delicacies. Heats up the body enough to protect it from the damaging effects of water.
dragonsurvival.description.dark_key: ■§7 An enchanted key that unlocks the Dark Vault in Nether. Drops if you kill a dragon hunter knight.
dragonsurvival.description.dark_upgrade: ■§7 A rare item that allows you to upgrade your Netherite Armor to Dark Armor. The armor will have built-in enchantments to help you effectively shed blood in the name of evil.
dragonsurvival.description.diamond_choru: ■§7 Removes Wither and Poison effects, and gives Absorption and Regeneration. Chorus Fruit stuffed with diamond dust. The diamonds are pulverized using the Ender Dragon's breath.
dragonsurvival.description.double_quartz: ■§7 Grants Regeneration. Quartz and Amethyst that has been combined with enough heat and force to greatly improve their flavor.
dragonsurvival.description.dragon_altar: ■§7 An altar that allows you to turn into a dragon and edit skin.
dragonsurvival.description.dragon_hunter: ■§7 The sword of the dragon hunters. Slow, but strong. Can be found in the hunters treasury.
dragonsurvival.description.dragon_rider_: ■§7 A work station for a villager who sells useful dragon enchantments. Knows the secrets to getting into the draconic vaults.
dragonsurvival.description.dragon_soul: ■§7 This vessel holds the dragon's soul. Use it to become a dragon. Replaces your current stats if you are a dragon.
dragonsurvival.description.dragon_soul.e: ■§7 An empty dragon's soul. With this item, you can store all your dragon's characteristics. After using it, you become human.
dragonsurvival.description.elder_dragon_:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 The remains of small dragons. This is used in many dragon recipes. The dragons were created from the body of an elder creature that sacrificed itself to save the world.

§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 Dust left from an ancient creature, this is used in many dragon recipes. Can be found in ore and treasure.

§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 A heart that is radiant and full of energy. If you listen, you can hear an elder voice calling to you from the depths. Ideal for an adult dragon's growth. Monsters with a lot of health will rarely drop this when killed.
dragonsurvival.description.explosive_cop: ■§7 Cave dragon dessert. Dangerous and unstable.
dragonsurvival.description.frozen_raw_fi: ■§7 Cleanses all effects and replenishes water. Food and water in one convenient package!
dragonsurvival.description.golden_coral_: ■§7 Grants Regeneration. Gilded pufferfish dusted with crushed coral. The gold neutralizes the natural poison of the pufferfish, making it safer for consumption.
dragonsurvival.description.golden_turtle: ■§7 Removes Wither and Poison effects, and gives Absorption and Regeneration. A turtle egg stuffed with dragon dust and gold. After a while, the dust reacts with the eggshell, changing its color and texture.
dragonsurvival.description.heart_element:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 A fragment from a small dragon's heart. Ideal for a newborn dragon's growth. Monsters with low health will rarely drop this when killed.
dragonsurvival.description.hot_dragon_ro: ■§7 A blaze rod seasoned with dragon dust; a crispy snack that increases the dragon's body temperature. Protects cave dragons from water for a short time.
dragonsurvival.description.hunter_key: ■§7 An enchanted key that unlocks a treasure vault for dragon hunters. Can be purchased from the Hunter Leader in the Hunter Castle.
dragonsurvival.description.hunter_partis: ■§7 A long shafted weapon designed to take out enemies at a distance. Especially good against flying dragons.
■§7 A long shafted weapon designed to take out enemies at a distance. Especially good against flying dragons.
■§7 A long shafted weapon designed to take out enemies at a distance. Especially good against flying dragons.
dragonsurvival.description.light_key: ■§7 An enchanted key that unlocks the Light Vault. Purchased from the dragon rider villager.
dragonsurvival.description.light_upgrade: ■§7 A rare item that allows you to upgrade your Netherite Armor to Light Armor. The armor will have built-in enchantments to help you live peacefully in this world.
dragonsurvival.description.luminous_oint: ■§7 A tincture of various glowing ingredients that protects against the darkness when consumed. Dark environments sap a forest dragon's strength as their own plants begin to devour them.
dragonsurvival.description.meat_chorus_m: ■§7 Grants Regeneration. The exotic Chorus Fruit has always been prized among forest dragons, and is commonly combined with raw meats.
dragonsurvival.description.meat_wild_ber: ■§7 A classic combination of sweet berries and wild herbs. A favorite amongst forest dragons.
dragonsurvival.description.quartz_explos: ■§7 Removes Wither and Poison effects, gives Absorption and Regeneration. A high-pressure heated mixture of Fused Quartz and Explosive Copper.
dragonsurvival.description.seasoned_fish: ■§7 A popular seafood dish amongst dragons. It is prepared by removing the skin and coating it with ink. This gives it an unusual taste and hue. The kelp leaf is for decoration and freshness.
dragonsurvival.description.smelly_meat_p: ■§7 A meat and bone fertilizer. Contains plenty of nutrients to feed a forest dragon's plants.
dragonsurvival.description.spearman_prom: ■ §7Use on a Hunter Spearman to turn him into a Hunter Leader.
dragonsurvival.description.spin_grant: ■§7 This item gives you dragon the ability to spin while flying. Consumed on use.
dragonsurvival.description.star_bone:
§7■ Deformed part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§f The energy absorbing dragon magic had captured this bone. Makes the dragon smaller.
dragonsurvival.description.star_heart:
§7■ Deformed part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§f The energy absorbing dragon magic had captured this heart. It is able to change the dragon's growth many times.
dragonsurvival.description.sweet_sour_ra: ■§7 Cleanses all active effects. Rabbit, marinated with a mixture of honey and spider eyes. Traditionally served during dragon holidays.
dragonsurvival.description.treasure: ■§7 Dragons can sleep on treasure to regenerate health and mana. Gathering more treasure increases the speed of the regeneration. Build your horde and show off your wealth!
dragonsurvival.description.weak_dragon_h:
§6■ Part of the Elder dragon.§r
■§7 A strengthened, but still unstable Heart. Ideal for a young dragon's growth. Some monsters will rarely drop this when killed.
dragonsurvival.description.wing_grant: ■§7 This item gives you the ability to fly. Consumed on use.
dragonsurvival.gui.ability.astral_too_de: You cannot use this ability while §c§ntoo deep§r§r in the gravity well, or while inside liquid.
You cannot use this ability while §c§ntoo deep§r§r in the gravity well, while flying, or while inside liquid.
dragonsurvival.gui.ability_target.disc_t: Targets a disc around you (radius: %s / height: %s)
Targets %s in a disc around you (radius: %s / height: %s)
dragonsurvival.gui.ability_target.lookin: Targets a block that you are looking at within a range of %s blocks
Targets %s that you are looking at within a range of %s blocks
dragonsurvival.gui.ability_upgrade.drago: §6■ Next level will be unlocked at growth %s
dragonsurvival.gui.ability_upgrade.exper: §6■ Next level will be unlocked at experience level %s
dragonsurvival.gui.altar.choice.human: You have awakened from your sleep, and become a human.
dragonsurvival.gui.altar.help:
§6■ Welcome to Dragon Survival!§r
■ You can choose which dragon §6species§r§r you want to become. This decision is not permanent, but you may lose progress if you change your mind.
■§7 Don't forget to read patch notes and delete old configs if you update our mod to avoid bugs! Enjoy the game! :3
dragonsurvival.gui.altar.info.human:
§7■ §6Humans§r§f are the builders, travelers, and dreamers of this world.
§2■ Features:§f§r§7 standard gameplay, varied diet, all items available for use.
§4■ Weakness:§r§7 no flight, no progressive increase in HP, no magic.
dragonsurvival.gui.altar.no_choice:
You didn't make your initial choice in the Dragon Altar!
You may still open the altar in your inventory.
dragonsurvival.gui.altar.title: Dragon Survival
dragonsurvival.gui.block_vision:
§6■ Block Vision:§r
 - Range: %s
 - Color: %s
 - Applies to: %s
dragonsurvival.gui.datapack.ancient_stag: Adds the Ancient dragon stage to Dragon Survival
dragonsurvival.gui.datapack.create: Adds loot tables to the Create treasures
dragonsurvival.gui.datapack.early_unlock: Unlocks Astral Dragons before visiting the End.
dragonsurvival.gui.datapack.silentgems: Adds loot tables to the Silent Gems treasures
dragonsurvival.gui.datapack.unlock_wings: Automatically unlocks dragon wings and prevents the ender dragon from disabling them in Dragon Survival
dragonsurvival.gui.diet_menu.no_custom_d: There is no custom dragon diet
dragonsurvival.gui.dragon_body_button.no: This body type has not been unlocked yet.
dragonsurvival.gui.dragon_body_button.un: You can only change the body type in the altar when changing the dragon's species.
dragonsurvival.gui.dragon_editor.confirm:

Would you still like to continue?

With your current config settings §4all progress will be lost§r§f when changing species.

Would you still like to continue?

With your current config settings §4your growth progress will be lost§r§f when changing species or body types.

Would you still like to continue?
dragonsurvival.gui.dragon_editor.copy: ■ Click here to §6copy§r your current settings to the other growth stages.
dragonsurvival.gui.dragon_editor.customi:
■ The texture from this editor is only visible if your §6custom§r skins are turned off in Skin Tab (dragon inventory). You can learn how to create your own custom skins or commission it on the §6Github Wiki§r or Dragon Survival discord.
§r-§7 Dragon Survival works with shaders, but they can affect the appearance of glowing textures.§r
dragonsurvival.gui.dragon_editor.default: If you are using a §6texture pack§r§f to test your custom skin before submitting it, check this box.
dragonsurvival.gui.dragon_editor.invalid: Save data invalid for this model
Save data invalid for this dragon species
dragonsurvival.gui.dragon_editor.no_data: No save data for this slot
dragonsurvival.gui.dragon_editor.save_sl:
■ You can select any §6slot§r here and click the §6load/save button§r to save your current settings to that slot or load the settings from that slot.
■ Your exports are stored here: %s
dragonsurvival.gui.dragon_inventory.togg: Toggle showing claws and teeth textures on your model.
dragonsurvival.gui.dragon_species_screen: ■ This species cannot gain the ability to fly.
This species has no special diet.

dragonsurvival.gui.emote_screen.info:
■ This is the emotes menu.
- The icon on the right will allow you to §6keybind§r§f and play the emote without entering this menu.
- Some emotions can be combined with each other. For example, §6Blend§r§f.
- Flip pages - §6mouse wheel§r§f.
dragonsurvival.gui.emote_screen.wiki: ■ This is a link to our §6Wiki§r§7 dedicated to making your own emote!§7
dragonsurvival.gui.ender_dragon_curse.to: You have been cursed by the ender dragon. You may be unable to use some of your abilities. You can cure this curse by using a Primordial Anchor block after resurrecting the dragon.
dragonsurvival.gui.flight_grant_gained: You feel empowered with the ability to fly.
dragonsurvival.gui.general.discord: ■ Join our §6discord server§r!§7 Read the Rules, FAQ and Wiki before you ask anything.
dragonsurvival.gui.handler.growth_info:
■ All dragons will gradually grow as time passes, improving their attributes. At certain growth stages, your appearance will change, and your growth will slow.§r
§7■ Certain items can speed up or reduce your growth.
§r
■ §6Growth items§r§7:§r
dragonsurvival.gui.harvest_bonus:
§6■ Harvest Bonus:§r
 - Base speed: %s
 - Harvest level: %s
 - Break speed: %s
 - Applies to: %s
dragonsurvival.gui.heals_for: §6■ Heals§r the target for %s of their maximum health
dragonsurvival.gui.help.ability_assignme:
■ §cUSE THE MOUSE WHEEL TO SCROLL THROUGH THE SKILL COLUMNS.
§f■ §dAbility assignment§r§f - drag and drop §6Active skills§r§f to the §9hotbar§r§f.
§f- §9Hotbar§r§8 is used to quickly access your active skills.
§f- §8Check in-game Minecraft §r§9control§r§8 settings!
dragonsurvival.gui.help.claws:
■ Just put §6any tools§r§f here in your claw slots and your bare paw will borrow their aspect as long as they are intact.
§7■ Does not stack with §2«Claws and Teeth»§r§7 skill, which only applies if these slots are empty.
dragonsurvival.gui.help.passive_active_a:
§f■ §cUSE THE MOUSE WHEEL TO SCROLL THROUGH THE SKILL COLUMNS.
§f■ §6Active skills§r§f are used in combat or to apply buffs.
§f- §9Skill power§r§8 scales off your current experience level.
§f- §9Experience or mana§r§8 points are used to cast spells.

§f■ §aPassive skills§r§f are upgraded by spending experience levels or just give bonuses.
§f- §9Disable§r§8 the skill by ctrl+right click.
§f- §9More information§r§8 can be found on Curseforge mod page or Github Wiki.
dragonsurvival.gui.hunger.max_saturation: You cannot have more than %s saturation from this ability.
dragonsurvival.gui.message.altar_cooldow: The altar is on cooldown for: %s
dragonsurvival.gui.message.cannot_pillag: You cannot steal from this villager
dragonsurvival.gui.message.flight_effect: You can't fly. Read more in the skill description.
dragonsurvival.gui.message.no_flight_eff: Your species does not have the ability to fly
dragonsurvival.gui.message.no_humans: You cannot turn into a human in this world
dragonsurvival.gui.message.no_hunger: Hunger has exhausted you, and you can't fly.
dragonsurvival.gui.message.no_unlocked_s: There are no available (unlocked) species present
dragonsurvival.gui.message.not_crouching: The creature you are trying to ride must be crouching for you to mount them.
dragonsurvival.gui.message.not_enough_ex: Not enough experience to gain the beacon effects (%s / %s)
dragonsurvival.gui.message.occupied: You need a 3x3 area to place %s
dragonsurvival.gui.message.pillage_on_co: You have to wait %s seconds until you can steal from this villager
dragonsurvival.gui.message.pillage_unsuc: This villager had no items you could steal
dragonsurvival.gui.message.self_too_big: You are too big to mount on this creature. You must be at most %s the scale of the creature you are trying to ride or smaller, but you are scale %s and the creature is scale %s.
dragonsurvival.gui.message.wings_blocked: Your wings are blocked or broken
dragonsurvival.gui.oxygen_bonus.bonus: Can breathe in %s for %s additional seconds
dragonsurvival.gui.primordial_anchor.fli: The ender dragon has blessed you with the ability to spin through the air.
The ender dragon has blessed you with the ability to fly and spin through the air.
dragonsurvival.gui.primordial_anchor.spi: The ender dragon has blessed you with the ability to fly.
dragonsurvival.gui.projectile_push_effec: Pushes targets away from the projectile with a strength of %s.
Pushes targets %s with a strength of %s.
Pushes targets in the direction the projectile is travelling with a strength of %s
Pulls targets towards the projectile with a strength of %s.
dragonsurvival.gui.push_effect.away: Pushes targets away from you with a strength of %s.
dragonsurvival.gui.push_effect.direction: Pushes targets %s with a strength of %s.
dragonsurvival.gui.push_effect.facing: Pushes targets in the direction you are facing with a strength of %s
dragonsurvival.gui.push_effect.towards: Pulls targets towards you with a strength of %s.
dragonsurvival.gui.skin_screen.custom_mo: because you are using a custom model.
dragonsurvival.gui.skin_screen.help:
■ §6Skin§r is a texture for your dragon. There are two types of skins: built-in and custom. 
■ §6Custom skin§r§f you can draw yourself and upload to our github so that all players can see this texture.
§7■ If you are interested in how to make your own skin or take a commission, use the buttons on the right.
dragonsurvival.gui.skin_screen.no_skin: No skin found for this stage
dragonsurvival.gui.skin_screen.random_in:
■ Shows a randomly selected §6other player§r§f who uploaded a skin.
■§7 You §ccan't use§r§f§7 their skins for yourself! Only look and admire! >:D
dragonsurvival.gui.skin_screen.wiki: ■ This is a link to our §6Wiki§r dedicated to making your own skin!§7 Remember that this will be very difficult, and requires knowledge of graphic editors. You can order a skin or a custom species from the author and thus support the project!
dragonsurvival.gui.smelting_effect.custo: §6■ Smelts items§r %s as fast as a furnace
dragonsurvival.gui.smelting_effect.furna: §6■ Smelts items§r at the speed of a furnace
dragonsurvival.gui.source_of_magic.help: ■ This source of magic can be charged with with the following items:
dragonsurvival.gui.spin_grant_gained: You feel empowered with the ability to spin through the air.
dragonsurvival.gui.system.reached_larges: You have reached the largest growth
dragonsurvival.gui.system.reached_smalle: You have reached the smallest growth
dragonsurvival.gui.teleport.towards: Teleport towards an entity up to %s blocks.
effect.dragonsurvival.animal_peace.desc: Animals will not flee from dragons with this effect active.
effect.dragonsurvival.blast_dusted.desc: You are about to explode if you don't find some water, quickly!
effect.dragonsurvival.blood_siphon.desc: Entities with this effect will restore life by 1% of the damage dealt (per amplifier) to the attacker
effect.dragonsurvival.broken_wings.desc: Your wings are broken and you can no longer fly. You have to wait for regeneration.
effect.dragonsurvival.burn.desc: The target takes fire damage. Damage dealt depends on the speed of the target.
effect.dragonsurvival.cave_fire.desc: Protects from the damaging effects of water.
effect.dragonsurvival.charged.desc: Produces arcs of electricity, damaging nearby mobs.
effect.dragonsurvival.confounded.desc: A deadly curse that impairs the senses, and causes you to take damage whenever you inflict harm upon others.
effect.dragonsurvival.drain.desc: Forest dragons produce this poisonous gas. Plants will grow when exposed to their breath, while most other things will have their life drained.
effect.dragonsurvival.hunter.desc: Forest dragons with this effect are invisible while standing in any foliage - their first attack will deal extra damage and remove the effect.
effect.dragonsurvival.hunter_omen.desc: You've been too aggressive. Be careful. There is a bounty on your head.
effect.dragonsurvival.magic_disabled.des: The knight has forbidden you to cast magic here.
effect.dragonsurvival.source_of_magic.de: Gives the dragon infinite mana to use magic.
effect.dragonsurvival.stress.desc: Applied to forest dragons who remain too long in the dark. Instantly removes all saturation, and quickly depletes hunger.
effect.dragonsurvival.trapped.desc: This net prevents you from escaping into the sky.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.aerodynamic_m: Light Set. Reduces flight stamina cost.
Dark Set. Has a chance to apply Blood Siphon to the enemy when you get hit, allowing you to recover a portion of the damage done.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.bolas.desc: Causes crossbows to shoot bolas instead, trapping hit entities.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.combat_recove: Light Set. When you take damage, has a chance to apply Regeneration to yourself.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.curse_of_kind: Light Set. Villagers and dragon hunters do not take damage from you.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.curse_of_outl: Dark Set. Causes you to be a permanent target for dragon hunters.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.draconic_supe: Dark Set. All damage you inflict is increased, and your melee damage is further increased.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.dragonsbane.d: Inflict increased damage to dragons. If you kill a dragon who has the Hunter's Omen effect, they will lose some growth progress. Damages dragons who hold it.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.murderers_cun: Dark Set. You inflict increased damage to targets with full health.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.overwhelming_: Dark Set. Debuffs you apply to targets are increased by 1 level.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.sacred_scales: Light Set. Has a chance to reduce incoming damage.
enchantment.dragonsurvival.unbreakable_s: Light Set. Reduces incoming debuffs by 1 level.
tag.block.dragonsurvival.end_platform_no: Not replaced by the dragon end platform
